languages.text: "Как вам будет угодно. Но чую, что с этим фанатиком придется повозиться. Допрос фанатиков — процесс самый долгий и увлекательный".
"As you command. Although I believe this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."
languages.original_text: "Как вам будет угодно. Но чую, что с этим фанатиком придется повозиться. Допрос фанатиков — процесс самый долгий и увлекательный".

traits.locale_text: "As you command. Although I believe that this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."
"As you command. Although I believe that this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."
"As you command. Although I believe that this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."
"As you command. Although I believe that this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."
"As you command. Although I believe this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."
"As you command. Although I believe this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."
"As you command. Although I believe this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."

languages.text: «Como ordene, pero creo que este fanático requerirá bastante esfuerzo. Interrogar a fanáticos es un proceso largo y emocionante».
languages.original_text: "As you command. Although I believe this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."

traits.locale_text: «Como ordene, pero creo que este fanático requerirá bastante esfuerzo. Interrogar a fanáticos es un proceso largo y emocionante».

languages.text: 「ご命令のままに。この信者には多少の努力が必要だと思いますが。信者を尋問するのは、長くてストレス発散になります」
languages.original_text: "As you command. Although I believe this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."

traits.locale_text: 「ご命令のままに。この信者には多少の努力が必要だと思いますが。信者を尋問するのは、長くてストレス発散になります」

languages.text: “遵命，大人。不过，若要从这个狂热分子嘴里撬出情报，可能要花费一些心血。审讯狂热分子是个漫长而又令人振奋的过程。”
languages.original_text: "As you command. Although I believe this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，大人。不过，若要从这个狂热分子嘴里撬出情报，可能要花费一些心血。审讯狂热分子是个漫长而又令人振奋的过程。”

languages.text: "Wie Ihr befehlt. Wobei ich glaube, dass dieser Fanatiker etwas Mühe erfordern wird. Fanatiker zu befragen, ist ein langwieriger und berauschender Prozess."
languages.original_text: "As you command. Although I believe this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr befehlt. Wobei ich glaube, dass dieser Fanatiker etwas Mühe erfordern wird. Fanatiker zu befragen, ist ein langwieriger und berauschender Prozess."

languages.text: « À votre guise, mais j'ai bien peur que cet illuminé vous donne du fil à retordre. Interroger les fanatiques est un processus aussi long qu'exaltant. »
languages.original_text: "As you command. Although I believe this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."

traits.locale_text: « À votre guise, mais j'ai bien peur que cet illuminé vous donne du fil à retordre. Interroger les fanatiques est un processus aussi long qu'exaltant. »

languages.text: "Nasıl dilerseniz. Gerçi bu bağnaz herifin biraz uğraştıracağını düşünüyorum. Fanatikleri sorguya çekmek, uzun ve heyecanlı bir süreçtir."
languages.original_text: "As you command. Although I believe this zealot will require some effort. Questioning fanatics is a long and exhilarating process."
